search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for MessageBird (messagebird.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for MessageBird is: [https://www.messagebird.com/en/pricing](https://www.messagebird.com/en/pricing)

extracted_content.content:

Reach

Custom pricing

![Image 2](https://framerusercontent.com/images/qcSsv7GbaFtvEmNcR7Q8wo8.png)

Compare Bird with
-----------------

How Bird stands out against competitors
---------------------------------------

### With Bird, you pay no markup on SMS

We’ve completely removed our markup on SMS messages, allowing you to save big on your messaging bill compared to Twilio.

How many SMS do you send monthly?

30,000

Estimated savings

\-56%

\-$183

Bird

Twilio

10DLC

SMS Price

Incl. carrier fees

$0.00331

$0.0109

Platform

$45

$0

Monthly Total

$144.30

$327.00

[Get tailored quote](https://www.messagebird.com/en/demo)

\*Carrier fees may apply when receiving SMS in the US.

### With Bird, inbound SMS is free for 10DLC and shortcode

Twilio charges customers for inbound SMS. This means you get charged when anybody sends you an SMS. With Bird, inbound SMS is free for 10DLC and shortcode\*.

[Go global](https://www.messagebird.com/en/demo)

\*Carrier fees may apply when receiving SMS in the US.

### With Twilio, you still pay for Segment

Bird offers CDP functionality out-of-the-box and directly integrated into the platform, while Twilio charges for Segment separately.

[Stop paying extra](https://www.messagebird.com/en/demo)

### With Twilio, you still pay for SendGrid

Need to send marketing emails? You’ll now need Twilio SendGrid account too. Bird lets you send Email, SMS and WhatsApp from the same platform.

[Start sending for less](https://www.messagebird.com/en/demo)

### With Bird, you don’t need to ask your developer

Twilio is built for developers, which means every change requires developer time. With Bird, you can easily make changes yourself to move faster so you can run more experiments.

[Unblock your team](https://www.messagebird.com/en/demo)

### Twilio offers no way to grow your list

With Twilio creating simple signup forms require custom engineering projects. With Bird you can add forms anywhere with the click of a button.

[Grow your list](https://www.messagebird.com/en/demo)

\*Based on internal pricing analysis conducted in February 2024, comparing the price of sending SMS through the Bird CRM to those sent through Twilio. Prices may vary based on many variables such as location, service configurations, platform fees, operator costs and/or promotions. This comparison does not encompass all possible market offerings and may not reflect future price changes. Verify current prices and features before making a purchase decision. Bird is a competitor of Twilio and not affiliated with Twilio. Trademarks mentioned belong to their respective owners.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing includes subscription-based tiers and usage-based fees for SMS and WhatsApp services. Enterprise pricing is custom and requires contacting sales.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For businesses targeting up to 3,000 monthly contacts.
features: Global coverage for SMS and WhatsApp

pricing_tiers.tier_description: For businesses targeting more than 50,000 monthly contacts.
features: Unlimited Email, SMS, and WhatsApp sends
Global coverage for SMS and WhatsApp

additional_fees.fee_description: Fees charged by third-party SMS providers without additional markup.
